metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17479 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In OpenJPEG 2.3.0, a stack-based buffer overflow was discovered in the pgxtoimage function in jpwl/convert.c. The vulnerability causes an out-of-bounds write, which may lead to remote denial of service or possibly remote code execution.

notes.Note: ccdm94> the commit which fixed this CVE also fixes CVE-2017-17480.

criterions.comment: openjpeg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
